meeting_annotations.transcript: to edit it. So you put your name and your affiliation and that way we fill that column. And Marta if you don't mind writing your name as a reporter, that way we get that out of the way.
meeting_annotations.screenshare_content: A Google Slides presentation is shared, showing a slide for "Room 4 Beyond CO2". The slide has a prompt about fundamental electrochemistry for Negative Emission Science. During the speech, names are typed into an "Attending" text box, including "Charles McCrory", "Michigan", and "Yanette Solis".
meeting_annotations.other: The speaker is acting as a facilitator, organizing the participants by having them sign in on the shared slide.
